annotations.description: Great solo effort by Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) as he beats two defenders before firing in a drive from just outside of the box towards the top right corner. The goalkeeper is ready and makes an amazing save. The ball goes out of play. Dortmund are awarded a corner kick.
